WorkItem.Description:
Hello Team,
We can find hundreds of sample for dragging and droping the Image in drop box using JQuery. But its hard to find sample in ASP.NET MVC where I can use JQuery to perform the same operation along with saving the data to database.
 
Here is the demo
http://demo.tutorialzine.com/2011/09/html5-file-upload-jquery-php/
 
I want to have same thing in ASP.NET MVC (JQuery) and when user drops the Image to the drop box, some data should be saved in database so that next time I can load the images in the dropping area.
 
Kindly help me to understand this feature by creating sample.
WorkItem.Summary: Saving data in database when Image is dropped to dropbox using JQuery
